oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mid-Century Miscellaneous Collections: the Dodsley Group
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mandell, Laura
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: poetry

Poetry--Collections--History--18th century
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This short essay describes large poetry collections published during the mid-eighteenth-century, arguing that some of their characteristics and features reveal assumptions about what constitutes literature.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: paj:The Journal of the Initiative for Digital Humanities, Media, and Culture; Vol. 1 No. 1 (2007): Inaugurating The Poetess Archive
